description: Current System Security Plan (SSP) document with all required sections completed, including system information, authorization boundary, and security controls implementation details
FIPS PUB 199 security categorization documentation with supporting rationale for the High baseline determination
FedRAMP Package ID and authorization path documentation (JAB or Agency authorization)
Enterprise architecture documentation showing how the system integrates with organizational architecture
System security and privacy architecture diagrams including network topology, data flows, and external system connections
Inventory of all system components within the authorization boundary, including services, ports, and protocols in use
Privacy Impact Assessment (PIA) or privacy risk assessment results for systems processing personally identifiable information
Current organizational planning policy and procedures documentation, including most recent review and approval dates
Rules of Behavior document with documented user acknowledgments (electronic or physical signatures)
Social media and external site usage policy and restrictions documentation
Separation of duties matrix showing role assignments for privileged and non-privileged administrators
List of FedRAMP-authorized cloud service providers (CSPs) and cloud service offerings (CSOs) with connection details and data types
Interconnection security agreements (ISAs) or memoranda of understanding (MOUs) for external system connections
Control baseline tailoring documentation showing scoping decisions, compensating controls, and parameter assignments for FedRAMP High baseline
Risk assessment reports identifying system-specific threats, vulnerabilities, and risk determinations for architecture and design decisions
SSP approval documentation from authorizing official or designated representative
SSP distribution records showing dissemination to Chief Privacy Officer, ISSO, and other required personnel
Evidence of annual SSP review and updates addressing system changes or assessment findings
Concept of Operations (CONOPS) document describing operational environment and mission/business processes
System criticality analysis and restoration priorities documentation
